sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import OrderSummaryBox from "../order summary box"; import "./style.css"; export default function Confirmation({ user }) { return (
Thank you! Your Order Number is #6268 A confimation email has been sent to {user.email}. Please check your email box.
Customer Infomation
{user.first_name} {user.last_name} {user.email} {user.phone}
Payment Method
{user.payment_method}
Delivery
{user.first_name} {user.last_name} {user.address_1} {user.address_2} {user.city}, {user.region} {user.zip} {user.phone}
Shipping Method
{user.shipping_method}
); }
